other_tests.findings: Initial score of 16, dropped to 0 within 72 hours after treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant reduction in withdrawal symptoms noted.

other_tests.findings: Total score was 23 at admission; during initial treatment, score averaged 27.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Score improved from 27 to 15 after increasing dose to 300mg/day, indicating a 44% improvement. Time spent on obsessions decreased by 87.5%.

other_tests.findings: Admission lithium serum level was 1.36 meq/liter, decreased to 0.41 meq/liter after medication withdrawal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Delirium symptoms persisted despite decrease in lithium levels, improving as treatment was managed more effectively.
